scripts.test:int:circleci: IN_GCP=false DB_TYPE=sqlite JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=tests/intreport.xml mocha --colors --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter --exit --recursive --timeout 60000 test/int
scripts.test:unit:circleci: IN_GCP=false DB_TYPE=sqlite JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=tests/unitreport.xml mocha --colors --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter --exit --recursive --timeout 60000 test/unit
scripts.start:local: cross-env STAGE=dev GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT=gcp-kokomo-dev DB_TYPE=sqlite MOCK_PLAYFAB_AUTH=true AUTH_DISABLED=true node app.js
scripts.start:itest: cross-env STAGE=dev IN_GCP=false NODE_ENV=itest DB_TYPE=sqlite MOCK_PLAYFAB_AUTH=true AUTH_DISABLED=true node app.js
scripts.gcp-build_tmp: node cloudProxy.js & sleep 5 && cross-env IN_GCP=true NODE_ENV=postgres_appengine sequelize-cli db:migrate && pkill cloud_sql_proxy
